actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study relating to the development of high speed rail systems within the United States.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Railway Administration and the National Railroad Passenger Corporation (Amtrak) to: (1) conduct a joint study to determine the most effective means by which the Federal Government can encourage the development of high speed rail systems; and (2) report jointly to the Congress the results of such study together with their recommendations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a study relating to the development of high speed rail systems within the United States.
